definition: to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: Obstinacy and self-will will always stab Jesus Christ.
sentences.chinese: 剛愎自用總是會刺傷耶穌基督。

sentences.english: Men of complacence are obstinate and consider they always right.
sentences.chinese: 這種人他們自以爲是，剛愎自用。

sentences.english: Posner may be wrong-headed, but he has bite and verve.
sentences.chinese: 也許波斯納剛愎自用，但他還有些尖銳和魄力。
